message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $145. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $130.  How about we meet in the middle at $137?
I'm still a bit higher than $137, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $135? I really want to make a deal with you, but I need to stay within my budget.
